jmf.messaging

Interface IMessagingService

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ZmqMessagingService

    public interface IMessagingService
    This class provides the interface definition for the ZMQ-module of ZMF. The IZmfMessagingCoreInterface class provides the logical counterpart. The Implementation Created on 8/2/15.
    Author:
    Tobias Korb, Jan Strau√ü
